ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Race of study subject
ValueRange: American Indian/Alaska Native; Asian; Hawaiian or Pacific Islander; Black or African American; White; More than one race; Unknown or not reported; Other Non-White; Other

ElementDescription: Ethnicity of participant
ValueRange: Hispanic or Latino; Not Hispanic or Latino; Unknown

ElementDescription: Marital Status:
Notes: 1=Single/Never married; 2=Married or living with someone as if married; 3= Divorced or annulled; 4= Separated; 5=Widowed; 6=Other; 7= Remarried

ElementDescription: Please check the highest level of schooling that you completed.
Notes: 1=Elementary school; 2=Junior high school; 3=High school; 4=Some college; 5=Technical school; 6= Junior college; 7=Four-year college; 8= Graduate or professional school

ElementDescription: Number of years in formal education
Respondent's occupation
family income
Current diagnosis
Smoker?
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes; 2= Yes, but not regularly (less than 10 per day); 3= Yes, regularly (10 or more a day); 4= Former smoker; 9=NK/missing

ElementDescription: how many packs per day if yes?
subject's current medications
Do you have a family history of mental illness?
Notes: 0 = No;  1 = Yes; 3 = Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: Any additional notes
handedness
Notes: R = Right; L = Left; B = Both; 999= No Answer; 888= Skipped; 777= Condition Skipped; 555= Missing

ElementDescription: Medical history and physical development - Height (inches)
weight
Notes: -5=item seen but not answered; -999=data not submitted (incomplete)

ElementDescription: body mass index of subject
Notes: -9=Missing; -5=Item/Instrument not collected; -2=Not collected at this time point

ElementDescription: If not employed, why are not you employed?
Notes: 1= Because of alcohol or other drug problems; 2= Because of other health problems; 3= Laid Off; 4= Other

ElementDescription: If other, please specify why you are not employed:

Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes; 88= Unknown; 99= N/A, my mother did not have alcoholism

ElementDescription: Please provide a brief description of your living situation.

ElementDescription: Please select your religious or spiritual affiliation.
Notes: 1 = Roman Catholic; 2 = Protestant (e.g., Baptist, Episcopalian, Methodist, Presbyterian, Lutheran, Quaker etc.); 3 = Eastern or Greek Orthodox; 4 = Mormon; 5 = Muslim; 6 = Buddhist; 7 = Jewish; 8 = Hindu; 9 = Sikh; 10 = New Religious Movement; 11 = Agnostic; 12 = Atheist; 13 = Other; 14 = Prefer not to answer
